briefTitle: Phase 3 Clinical Trial of Teriparatide in Japan

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Japanese patients diagnosed with osteoporosis
* Aged 55 or older
* Patients who are at high risk for fracture

Exclusion Criteria:

* History of metabolic bone disorders other than primary osteoporosis
* History of malignant neoplasm in the 5 years, with the exception of superficial basal cell carcinoma or squamous cell carcinoma of the skin that has been definitively treated.
* Severe or chronically disabling conditions other than osteoporosis

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Bone Mineral Density at Lumbar Spine (L2-L4)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in bone mineral density (BMD) at lumbar spine (L2-L4) from baseline to the last measurement point.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at Lumbar Spine (L1-L4)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in bone mineral density at lumbar spine (L1-L4) from baseline to the last measurement point.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at Total Hip
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in bone mineral density (BMD) at total hip from baseline to the last measurement point.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at Femoral Neck
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in bone mineral density at femoral neck from baseline to the last measurement point.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Biochemical Markers of Bone Metabolism - Serum Procollagen I N-terminal Propeptide (PINP)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in serum procollagen I N-terminal propeptide (PINP) from baseline to the individual visits and last measurement point.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Biochemical Markers of Bone Metabolism - Serum Bone-specific Alkaline Phosphatase (BAP)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in serum bone-specific alkaline phosphatase (BAP) from baseline to the individual visits and last measurement point.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Biochemical Markers of Bone Metabolism - Serum Type I Collagen Crosslinked C-telopeptide (CTX)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in serum type I collagen crosslinked C-telopeptide (CTX) from baseline to the individual visits and last measurement point.

outcomeMeasures.title: Vertebral Fractures by Central X-ray Assessment
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of vertebral fractures observed from Visit 1 (study entry) through Visit 19 (Week 52). All new or worsened vertebral fractures were defined as a deterioration of at least one grade in a semiquantitative score by X-ray assessment. Number of subjects with fractures and number of fractured vertebra(e) were counted.

outcomeMeasures.title: Fractures by Investigators Assessment
outcomeMeasures.description: Vertebral and nonvertebral fractures assessed by the investigator or subinvestigator after starting the study treatment. Traumatic fractures were those caused by falling from above standing height or a high velocity (car) accident. Fractures were assessed to be "fragility" if they occurred without trauma.

outcomeMeasures.title: Back Pain Severity
outcomeMeasures.description: Severity of back pain at baseline, individual visits and the last measurement point. Back pain was measured on a scale of 1 (none) to 4 (severe).

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Bone Mineral Density at Lumbar Spine (L2-L4) During Open Label Phases at 76 Weeks and 104 Weeks
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in bone mineral density (BMD) at lumbar spine (L2-L4) from baseline to the last measurement point.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at Lumbar Spine (L1-L4) During Open Label Phases at 76 Weeks and 104 Weeks
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in bone mineral density at lumbar spine (L1-L4) from baseline to the last measurement point.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at Total Hip During Open Label Phases at 76 Weeks and 104 Weeks
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in bone mineral density (BMD) at total hip from baseline to the last measurement point.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at Femoral Neck During Open Label Phases at 76 Weeks and 104 Weeks
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in bone mineral density at femoral neck from baseline to the last measurement point.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Biochemical Markers of Bone Metabolism - Serum Procollagen I N-terminal Propeptide (PINP) During Open Label Phases at 76 Weeks and 104 Weeks
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in serum procollagen I N-terminal propeptide (PINP) from baseline to the individual visits and last measurement point.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Biochemical Markers of Bone Metabolism - Serum Bone-specific Alkaline Phosphatase (BAP) During Open Label Phases at 76 Weeks and 104 Weeks
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in serum bone-specific alkaline phosphatase (BAP) from baseline to the individual visits and last measurement point.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Biochemical Markers of Bone Metabolism - Serum Type I Collagen Crosslinked C-telopeptide (CTX) During Open Label Phases at 76 Weeks and 104 Weeks
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in serum type I collagen crosslinked C-telepeptide (CTX) from baseline to the individual visits and last measurement point.

outcomeMeasures.title: Vertebral Fractures by Central X-ray Assessment During Entire Study Period of 104 Weeks
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of vertebral fractures observed from Visit 1 (study entry) through 104 weeks. All new or worsened vertebral fractures were defined as a deterioration of at least one grade in a semiquantitative score by X-ray assessment. Number of subjects with fractures and number of fractured vertebra(e) were counted.

outcomeMeasures.title: Fractures by Investigators Assessment During Entire Study Period of 104 Weeks
outcomeMeasures.description: Vertebral and nonvertebral fractures assessed by the investigator or subinvestigator after starting the study treatment. Traumatic fractures were those caused by falling from above standing height or a high velocity (car) accident. Fractures were assessed to be "fragility" if they occurred without trauma.

outcomeMeasures.title: Back Pain Severity During Open Label Phases at 76 Weeks and 104 Weeks
outcomeMeasures.description: Severity of back pain at 76 weeks and 104 weeks. Back pain was measured on a scale of 1 (none) to 4 (severe).
